name: Sewer Ball
description:
Summary:

  Keep the ball in the air for as long as possible,  keep the ball moving left and right, and don't hit the walls. Stop the ball from hitting the weird juice liquid by intercepting it with the platform. To move the platform use the arrow keys / "a" and "d" keys.  Power-ups can help you, if you use mobile simply tap the left/right sides below the platform. From here you will have to learn from trial/error 

and experience.

Credits: Me

Update Tomorrow with more SFX
